name: All You Can Eat (itch) (Phil Johnson)
description:
The joy and glory of dining at an all-you-can-eat restaurant is evident from the name; there is infinite potential value in being able to consume as much food as one desires  in a given amount of time. Unfortunately for Mai Foreman, the protagonist of this small game, the amount of time in question is a mere twenty seconds. Will that be enough time to get a meal's worth of food down her gullet? That depends on your finger speed! 

The idea for this game came about when I realized how fun it was to press a repeating sequence of buttons as fast as possible. At least I find it to be fun. Hopefully you do as well, since that's all this game is: pressing down, up, down again, and right in that order as many times as you can in twenty seconds. Even if you don't, I still hope you enjoy this little project! And either way, thanks for playing!

This game was a submission to the 20 Second Game Jam, a jam entirely comprised of games that last only 20 seconds. Trying to come up with a concept for a game that could be fully explained and still entertaining in such a short time span was quite the fun challenge! Speaking of challenge, the highest score I was able to get was 60, but I'm sure people with faster fingers than I could do better! If you happen to be one of those people, please post your score in the comments!
